instruction.en: Press a button 3 times in quick succession.
instruction.nl: Druk 3 keer snel achter elkaar op een knop.
instruction.de: Drücken Sie eine Tatse 3x schnell hintereinander

instruction.en: Press a button 3 times in quick succession.
instruction.nl: Druk 3 keer snel achter elkaar op een knop.
instruction.de: Drücken Sie eine Tatse 3x schnell hintereinander

hint.en: This is the Z-Wave Lifeline group, it is not recommended to change this.
hint.nl: Dit is de Z-Wave Lifeline groep, het is niet aangeraden deze te veranderen.

hint.en: NanoMote Quad sends basic set command when the button 1 is triggered
NanoMote Quad sends switch multilevel set, multilevel start level change and multilevel stop level change command when the button 1 is triggered.
NanoMote Quad sends basic set command when the button 2 is triggered.
NanoMote Quad sends switch multilevel set, multilevel start level change and multilevel stop level change command when the button 2 is triggered.
NanoMote Quad sends basic set command when the button 3 is triggered.
NanoMote Quad sends switch multilevel set, multilevel start level change and multilevel stop level change command when the button 2 is triggered.
NanoMote Quad sends basic set command when the button 4 is triggered.
NanoMote Quad sends switch multilevel set, multilevel start level change and multilevel stop level change command when the button 2 is triggered.
